page.title: 04Employment in the Cowtons
page.content: There is little local employment in the Cowtons. The two garages offer some, as do the 12 farms. Part time employment, especially for women, is found in the 3 public houses and 2 schools in the area. Most others have to commute to Darlington, Teesside or Northallerton to find work. In North Cowton from 132 adults living in the area covered, there were 65 commuters, 2 men working away from home and 4 unemployed. In a similar survey in East Cowton, from 176 adults there were 96 commuters, 6 working away and 13 unemployed. 21 had village employment although these were mostly part time. 33% of wives work in North Cowton but only 89 are full time. In East Cowton over 50% work and 39% are full time, often in a proffesional capacity.
